CustomField.description: Check this box to make Azure OpenAI the default LLM provider for the Prompt Factory. Only one LLM provider should be set as default at a time.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box to use Azure OpenAI GPT-4o as the default AI provider. Uncheck to use Claude AI instead. Only one provider should be set as default at a time.
CustomField.label: Default
